channel.title: Owyhee County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Owyhee County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-55 North - Canyon County/Snake River
item.description: ID-55 north crossing the Snake River and entering Canyon County.

item.title: End ID-78 at ID-55
item.description: End ID-78 at ID-55 in Marsing. Turn right for ID-55 north to Nampa and Boise. Turn left for ID-55 south to Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: End ID-78 West at ID-55
item.description: End ID-78 West at ID-55 in Marsing.

item.title: ID-78 West Approaching ID-55
item.description: ID-78 West approaching ID-55 in Marsing.

item.title: ID-78 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-78 west. Distance to Nampa, Marsing, and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: ID-78 West - Murphy
item.description: Entering Murphy (unincorporated) on ID-78 west. Murphy is the county seat of Owyhee County.

item.title: ID-78 West - Silver City
item.description: ID-78 West at Silver City junction.

item.title: ID-78 West - Oreana
item.description: ID-78 west at Oreana junction.

item.title: ID-78 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-78 west. Distance to Nampa, Marsing, and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: ID-78 West at ID-45
item.description: ID-78 West at ID-45 in Owyhee County. The shields are the new style of Idaho state highway shields.

item.title: ID-78 West at ID-45
item.description: ID-78 West at ID-45 in Owyhee County. Use ID-45 north for Nampa; ID-78 west for Marsing. The shields are the new style of Idaho state highway shields.

item.title: End ID-78 at ID-55
item.description: End ID-78 at ID-55 in Marsing. Turn right for ID-55 north to Nampa and Boise. Turn left for ID-55 south to Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north at ID-78 junction to Grandview and Bruneau. Continue north on ID-55 to Nampa and Boise. Milepost 2.

item.title: ID-55 North - Givens Hot Springs
item.description: ID-55 north approaching ID-78 junction in Marsing. Use ID-78 south for Givens (Hot) Springs.

item.title: US-95 South/ID-19 At ID-19 West
item.description: US-95 South/ID-19 West At US-95/ID-19 split. Merge right for ID-19 west to Homedale and Adrian (Oregon). Continue south on US-95 for Marsing and Jordan Valley (Oregon).

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-51
item.description: ID-78 East at ID-51 junction in Owyhee County. Continue on ID-78 East/ID-51 North for Bruneau and Mountain Home. Use ID-51 South for Duck Valley and Elko, Nevada.

item.title: ID-78 East Approaching ID-51
item.description: ID-78 East approaching ID-51 in Owyhee County. ID-78 East joins ID-51 north through Bruneau.

item.title: ID-78 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-78 east. Distance to Bruneau and Elko (Nevada).

item.title: End ID-167 West at ID-78
item.description: End ID-167 west at ID-78 in Grand View. ID-167 is the newest state highway in Idaho, formed in May of 2010. ID-167 replaces ID-67 between Mountain Home Air Force Base and Grand View.

item.title: ID-51 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-51 north. Distance to Riddle, Grasmere, and Mountain Home. This is the first shield and distance marker along ID-51 after the stateline.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - ID-51 North
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on ID-51 north at the Idaho-Nevada state line. 42nd Parallel North.

item.title: ID-78 West at Mud Flat Road
item.description: ID-78 west at Mud Flat Road to Mud Flat and Juniper Mountain. Continue west on ID-78 for Grand View.

item.title: ID-78 West at ID-51
item.description: ID-78 west at ID-51. Use ID-51 north for Mountain Home. Use ID-51 South/ID-78 West for Bruneau and Elko, Nevada.

item.title: ID-78 West - Owyhee County
item.description: ID-78 west in Owyhee County. The ID-78 shield here is the new style of shields used on guide signs that have been appearing around the state. It appears the incorrect type of state highway shield was used here.

item.title: Bruneau Dunes State Park Road at ID-78
item.description: Bruneau Dunes State Park Road at ID-78 in Owyhee County. Turn right for ID-78 east to Hammett; turn left for ID-78 west to Mountain Home and Bruneau.

item.title: ID-51 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-51 north to Mountain Home and Boise.

item.title: ID-78 West at ID-51
item.description: ID-78 west at ID-51. Use ID-51 north for Mountain Home. Use ID-51 South/ID-78 West for Bruneau and Elko, Nevada.

item.title: ID-45 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-45 north. Distance to Melba, Nampa, and Boise.

item.title: ID-78 East - Sommercamp Road
item.description: ID-78 East at Sommercamp Road junction. Merge left to continue east on ID-78.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-95 south approaching ID-55. Turn right to continue south on US-95 to Winnemucca (Nevada); straight for ID-55 north to Marsing and Nampa.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-95 South approaching ID-55 near Marsing.

item.title: US-95 South at Y Road
item.description: US-95 South at Y Road. Merge left to continue south on Y Road.

item.title: Main St. South at US-95
item.description: Main St. South at US-95 in Homedale. Turn left for US-95 north to Caldwell and Lewiston. Turn right for US-95 south to Marsing and Jordan Valley (Oregon).

item.title: ID-19 East at US-95 in Homedale
item.description: ID-19 East at US-95 in Homedale. Turn right for US-95 south to Marsing. Continue straight for US-95 North/ID-19 East to Caldwell and Wilder.

item.title: ID-19 East at US-95 in Homedale
item.description: ID-19 East at US-95 in Homedale. Turn right on Main St. to access US-95 south; continue straight on Idaho Ave. to access US-95 north. ID-19 joins US-95 east to Wilder. US-95 no longer passes through this intersection since the bypass was completed.

item.title: ID-19 East Approaching Main St. (To US-95)
item.description: ID-19 East Approaching Main St. (To US-95) in Homedale. Main St. was the former route of US-95 through Homedale before the bypass was completed.

item.title: ID-19 East - Homedale
item.description: ID-19 shield in Homedale.

item.title: ID-19 East - Entering Homedale
item.description: Entering Homedale on ID-19 east. Homedale is the largest city on Owyhee County.

item.title: ID-19 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-19 east. Distance to Homedale.

item.title: ID-19 East - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome To Idaho on ID-19 east.

item.title: ID-51 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-51 north. Distance to Mountain Home and Boise.

item.title: ID-51 North/ID-78 East Jct.
item.description: ID-51 North/ID-78 East at ID-51/ID-78 junction. Turn right for ID-78 east to Hammett and Bruneau Dunes State Park. Continue north on ID-51 for Mountain Home and Boise.

item.title: ID-51 North/ID-78 East at Split
item.description: ID-51 North/ID-78 East at split. Merge right to continue east on ID-78.

item.title: ID-51 North/ID-78 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-51 North/ID-78 East. Distance to Mountain Home and Boise.

item.title: ID-51 North/ID-78 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-51 North/ID-78 East. Distance to Bruneau, Mountain Home, and Boise.

item.title: ID-78 West at ID-167 East
item.description: ID-78 west at ID-167 east in Grand View.

item.title: ID-78 West at Mud Flat Road
item.description: ID-78 west at Mud Flat Road to Mud Flat and Juniper Mountain. Continue west on ID-78 for Grand View. This is the beginning of the Owyhee Uplands Backcountry Byway, which follows Mud Flat Road along the south side of the Owyhee Mountains and ending in Jordan Valley, Oregon.

item.title: ID-51 North - Entering Grasmere
item.description: Entering Grasmere on ID-51 north. Grasmere is basically a ghost town. There are some broken down gas pumps and a few abandoned buildings.

item.title: ID-51 North - Leaving Duck Valley Indian Reservation
item.description: Leaving the Duck Valley Indian Reservation on ID-51 north.

item.title: ID-51 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-51 north. Distance to Riddle, Grasmere, and Mountain Home. This is the first shield and distance marker along ID-51 after the stateline.

item.title: End ID-167 West at ID-78
item.description: End ID-167 west at ID-78 in Grand View. ID-167 is the newest state highway in Idaho, formed in May of 2010. ID-167 replaces ID-67 between Mountain Home Air Force Base and Grand View.

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-167
item.description: ID-78 east at ID-167.

item.title: ID-78 East Approaching ID-167
item.description: ID-78 east approaching ID-167.

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-45
item.description: ID-78 east to Murphy at ID-45 north to Nampa.

item.title: ID-78 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-78 west to Marsing, Homedale, and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78. Use ID-78 west for Marsing. Use ID-78 east for Murphy, the Owyhee County Seat.

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78. A short connector road links ID-45 south with ID-78 west.

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78. Use ID-78 south for Murphy and Grand View. Use ID-78 north for Marsing.

item.title: End ID-45 South at ID-78
item.description: End ID-45 south at ID-78.

item.title: ID-55 North at Canyon County Line
item.description: ID-55 north crossing the Snake River and entering Canyon County.

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north at ID-78 junction to Grand View and Brueau in Marsing.

item.title: ID-55 North Approaching ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north approaching ID-78 junction in Marsing.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-55.

item.title: US-95 North - Distance Marker
item.description: First distance marker on US-95 north in Idaho. Distance to Marsing, Homedale, and Boise (not on US-95).

item.title: US-95 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-95 north at the Oregon-Idaho State Line.

item.title: US-95 North - Oregon Thanks You
item.description: Oregon Thanks You Come Back Soon on US-95 north.

item.title: ID-51 North At ID-78
item.description: ID-51 north at ID-78 west to Marsing.

item.title: ID-51 North at ID-78
item.description: ID-51 north approaching ID-78. ID-78 follows ID-51 north through Bruneau.

item.title: Jct. ID-78 on ID-51 North
item.description: ID-51 north approaching ID-78.

item.title: ID-51 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-51 north to Mountain Home and Boise.

item.title: ID-78 West at ID-67 East
item.description: ID-78 west at ID-67 east to Mountain Home.

item.title: ID-55 South - Owyhee County Line
item.description: ID-55 south at Snake River/Owyhee county line.

item.title: ID-55 South Approaching ID-78
item.description: ID-55 south approaching ID-78.

item.title: ID-55 South at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 south at ID-78 east to Grand View and Bruneau. ID-78 follows the south side of the Snake River to Hammett.

item.title: ID-78 East - Distance Marker
item.description: ID-78 east to Murphy, Grand View, and Murphy just south of Marsing.

item.title: ID-78 East - Owyhee County Museum
item.description: ID-78 east at Hailey St. to Owyhee County Museum.

item.title: ID-78 East - Snow Removal Hours
item.description: Snow removal hours on ID-78 between Marsing and Bruneau.

item.title: ID-78 East Approaching ID-45
item.description: Junction ID-45 north on ID-78 east.

item.title: ID-78 East Approaching ID-45
item.description: Junction ID-45 to Melba on ID-78 east.

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-45
item.description: ID-78 east to Murphy at ID-45 north to Nampa.

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-67
item.description: ID-78 east at ID-67 east to Mountain Home.

item.title: ID-51 South - Distance Marker
item.description: ID-51 South and distance marker to Owyhee, Mountain City, and Elko in Riddle. Just north of the Duck Valley Indian Reservation.

item.title: ID-55 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-55 north in Marsing. Distance to Marsing, Nampa, and Boise.

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78
item.description: ID-55 north approaching ID-78 junction in Marsing.

item.title: ID-55 North at ID-78 West
item.description: ID-55 north at ID-78 junction to Grand View and Brueau in Marsing.

item.title: ID-78 East - Marsing
item.description: ID-78 east shield in Marsing.

item.title: ID-78 East - Snow Removal Hours
item.description: Sign describing snow removal schedule on ID-78 between Marsing and Bruneau.

item.title: ID-78 East Approaching ID-45
item.description: Junction ID-45 on ID-78 east in Owyhee County.

item.title: ID-78 East at ID-45
item.description: Junction ID-45 north to Nampa on ID-78 east Owyhee County.

item.title: ID-78 East At ID-45 North
item.description: ID-78 east at ID-45 north in Owyhee County.

item.title: Jct. ID-45 on ID-78 East
item.description: Junction ID-45 on ID-78 east in Owyhee County.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-55
item.description: US-95 south approaching ID-55. Turn right to continue south on US-95 to Winnemucca (Nevada); straight for ID-55 north to Marsing and Nampa.

item.title: US-95 South/ID-19 At ID-19 West
item.description: US-95 South/ID-19 West At US-95/ID-19 split. Merge right for ID-19 west to Homedale and Adrian (Oregon). Continue south on US-95 for Marsing and Jordan Valley (Oregon).

item.title: ID-51 South at ID-78
item.description: ID-78 Junction to Hammett on ID-51 South to Elko. ID-78 joins ID-51 south through Bruneau.

item.title: ID-51 South at ID-78
item.description: ID-51 south at ID-78. ID-78 joins ID-51 south for a few miles.

item.title: ID-78 West at ID-51
item.description: ID-78 west at ID-51. Use ID-51 north for Mountain Home. Use ID-51 South/ID-78 West for Bruneau and Elko, Nevada. C.J. Strike Reservoir is in the background.

item.title: US-95 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 north. Distance to Homedale, Wilder, and Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-55
item.description: US-95 north at ID-55 near Marsing. Turn right for ID-55 north to Boise. Turn left for US-95 north to Homedale and Payette.

item.title: US-95 South at ID-55
item.description: US-95 south at ID-55 junction near Glenns Ferry.

item.title: US-95 North - Welcome To Idaho
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-95 North at the Oregon/Idaho border.

item.title: US-95 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-95 South to Jordan Valley (OR)/McDermitt (NV and OR)/Winnemucca(NV).
